data.prayer: Father, help the 17,160 believers in Abu Dhabi to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,432,840 lost friends and neighbors.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Abu Dhabi who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Romani, Domari people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates has a population of 1,450,000.

We estimate Abu Dhabi has 17,160 people who might know Jesus, 74,604 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,358,236 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 84 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight
